movies.title: Prince and Family
movies.HSV: Prince and Family - A Heartfelt Malayalam Comedy Drama
movies.cast: Dileep, Raniya Raanaa, Dhyan Sreenivasan, Siddique, Bindu Panicker, Johny Antony, Manju Pillai, Josekutty Jacob
movies.crew: Binto Stephen (Director), Sharis Mohammed (Writer), Listin Stephen (Producer), Sanal Dev (Music), Renadive (Cinematography), Sagar Das (Editing)
movies.plot: Prince and Family is a Malayalam comedy-drama centered on Prince Chakkalakkal, an introverted bridal boutique owner and the town's most eligible bachelor. His serene life takes a chaotic turn when he marries Chinju Rani, a lively social media vlogger with a contrasting personality. The film explores the humorous and emotional complexities of their married life, delivering a blend of laughter, family emotions, and a critique of social media addiction.

movies.title: Thudarum
movies.HSV: Thudarum - A Gripping Malayalam Drama Thriller
movies.crew: Tharun Moorthy (Director, Writer), M Renjith (Producer), Jakes Bejoy (Music), Vysakh Sukumaran (Cinematography), Nishadh Yusuf (Editing)
movies.plot: Thudarum is a compelling drama thriller centered on Shanmugham, a humble taxi driver in Ranni, whose deep bond with his aging Ambassador car is tested by unexpected circumstances. The narrative weaves themes of honor killing and revenge, blending emotional family drama with intense action sequences. Mohanlal’s powerful performance as Benz, combined with a gritty screenplay and stellar music, delivers a massy yet grounded cinematic experience.

movies.title: Padakkalam
movies.HSV: Padakkalam - A Whimsical Malayalam Fantasy Comedy
movies.cast: Suraj Venjaramoodu, Sharafudheen, Sandeep Pradeep, Niranjana Anoop, Pooja Mohanraj, Arun Ajikumar, Saaf Bros, Ishan Shoukath
movies.crew: Manu Swaraj (Director, Writer), Nithin C Babu (Writer), Vijay Babu (Producer), Vijay Subramaniam (Producer), Anu Moothedath (Cinematography), Nidhin Raj Arol (Editing), Rajesh Murugesan (Music)
movies.plot: Padakkalam is a supernatural fantasy comedy that follows four nerdy comic book enthusiasts in a college’s ECE department. Their lives take a chaotic turn when a charismatic professor, Ranjith, introduces a magical dice board with unpredictable powers. What begins as innocent curiosity spirals into a battle of wits and magical mayhem, blending campus shenanigans with pop culture references and heartfelt moments for a fun-filled adventure.

movies.title: Alappuzha Gymkhana
movies.HSV: Alappuzha Gymkhana - A Heartwarming Malayalam Sports Comedy
movies.cast: Naslen, Lukman Avaran, Franco Francis, Noila Francy
movies.crew: Khalid Rahman (Director, Writer), Jobin George (Producer), Jimshi Khalid (Cinematography), Jakes Bejoy (Music), Mashar Hamsa (Editing)
movies.plot: Alappuzha Gymkhana is a sports comedy following a group of teenage boys who, after failing exams, turn to boxing to secure college admissions through sports quotas. Under tough training, they transform from rookies to contenders, facing rivals and personal insecurities. The film blends humor, heart, and boxing sequences, offering an entertaining and inspiring tale of self-discovery.

movies.title: Maranamass
movies.HSV: Maranamass - A Quirky Malayalam Action Comedy
movies.cast: Basil Joseph, Rajesh Madhavan, Siju Sunny, Suresh Krishna, Anishma Anilkumar
movies.crew: Sivaprasad KV (Director), Tovino Thomas (Producer), Rapheal Pozholiparambil (Producer), Tingston Thomas (Producer), Siju Sunny (Writer, Screenplay, Dialogue), Hesham Abdul Wahab (Music), Abinandhan Ramanujam (Cinematography), Chaman Chakko (Editing)
movies.plot: Maranamass is a Malayalam action comedy that brings together unrelated characters in a whirlwind of quirky events and dark humor. Centered around a serial killer conflict, the story unfolds with hilarious mishaps and thrilling twists, delivering an engaging narrative despite a slow start. Standout performances by Rajesh Madhavan and Suresh Krishna add to the film's charm.

movies.title: L2: Empuraan
movies.cast: Mohanlal, Prithviraj Sukumaran, Manju Warrier, Tovino Thomas
movies.crew: Prithviraj Sukumaran, Antony Perumbavoor, Gokulam Gopalan, Murali Gopy, Deepak Dev
movies.plot: L2: Empuraan is a sequel to Lucifer and continues the story of Khureshi-Ab'raam, the mysterious alter ego of Stephen Nedumpally. The plot delves into his rise through international crime and politics, revealing the origins of his power and influence. As he expands his empire, he faces enemies from both his past and present, leading to intense confrontations. The film intertwines political intrigue, action, and personal vendettas, setting the stage for a larger war between global forces and Khureshi's growing dominion.

movies.title: Bromance
movies.cast: Mathew Thomas, Arjun Ashokan, Mahima Nambiar, Sangeeth Prathap, Kalabhavan Shajohn
movies.crew: Arun D. Jose (Director), Raveesh Nath, Thomas P. Sebastian (Writers), Govind Vasantha (Music)
movies.plot: Bromance is an adventure comedy that follows Binto as he teams up with his brother Shinto's friends to find his missing sibling. Their journey is filled with twists, revelations, and humor, offering a fresh take on brotherhood and youthful friendship amidst unexpected chaos.

movies.title: Officer on Duty
movies.cast: Kunchacko Boban, Priyamani, Jagadish, Vishak Nair
movies.crew: Jithu Ashraf (Director), Shahi Kabir (Writer), Jakes Bejoy (Music)
movies.plot: Officer on Duty is a gripping action thriller that follows CI Harishankar, a disciplined yet aggressive officer, as he investigates a case that unexpectedly ties into his personal trauma. As he uncovers a deeper nexus involving counterfeit gold and a powerful drug syndicate, Harishankar faces a test of justice, morality, and redemption.

movies.title: Ouseppinte Osiyathu
movies.cast: Vijayaraghavan, Dileesh Pothan, Kalabhavan Shajohn, Lenaa, Kani Kusruti, Hemanth Menon
movies.crew: Sarath Chandran RJ (Director), Fazal Hassan (Writer), Sumesh Parameswar (Music), Arvind Kannabiran (Cinematography)
movies.plot: Ouseppinte Osiyathu is a poignant Malayalam drama set against the picturesque hills of Idukki. The film delves into the complexities of familial relationships, focusing on Ousepp, a resilient planter, and his three sons—Michael, George, and Roy. As ambition and personal desires clash, the family grapples with deep-seated resentments and the quest for redemption. The narrative explores themes of love, regret, and the enduring bonds of family.

movies.title: Daveed
movies.cast: Antony Varghese, Lijomol Jose, Vijayaraghavan, Saiju Kurup, Aju Varghese, Mo Ismail
movies.crew: Govind Vishnu (Director), Deepu Rajeevan & Govind Vishnu (Writers), Justin Varghese (Music)
movies.plot: Daveed is a Malayalam sports drama that follows Ashiq Abu, a middle-aged bouncer who faces a life-changing rivalry with Turkish boxer Sainul Akhmedov. The film explores themes of redemption, perseverance, and the underdog's journey.

movies.title: Dassettante Cycle
movies.crew: Akhil Kavungal (Director & Writer), Rahul C. Vimala (Cinematography), Jomon Cyriac (Editor)
movies.plot: Dassettante Cycle is a Malayalam comedy-drama that follows Dasan, a discontented security guard whose life takes unexpected turns as his family's journey unfolds. A series of intriguing incidents lead to the unraveling of long-held secrets, testing their bonds and resilience. The film delves into family dynamics, emotions, and humor, offering a heartfelt and engaging cinematic experience.

movies.title: Bad Boyz
movies.cast: Rahman, Dhyan Sreenivasan, Bibin George, Anson Paul, Senthil Krishna, Sheelu Abraham
movies.crew: Omar Lulu (Director), Sarang Jayaprakash (Writer), William Francis (Music)
movies.plot: Bad Boyz is a Malayalam action comedy that follows Antappan, a directionless schoolboy who finds purpose after meeting Mary, an achiever with a surprising fascination with local goons. To win her over, he dives into the dangerous world of crime and becomes a full-time goon himself. The story unfolds with suspense and humor, revealing the thrilling consequences of Antappan's decision.
movies.platform: Amazon Prime Video and Manorama Max

movies.title: Painkili
movies.cast: Sajin Gopu, Anaswara Rajan, Roshan Shanavas, Jisma Vimal, Chandu Salimkumar, Lijo Jose Pellissery
movies.crew: Sreejith Babu (Director), Jithu Madhavan (Writer), Justin Varghese (Music), Arjun Sethu (Cinematography), Kiran Das (Editing)
movies.plot: Painkili is a Malayalam romantic comedy that follows Suku, a small-town graphic designer whose life takes an unexpected turn after a mishap leads him to feign mental illness to evade legal trouble. While navigating the challenges of maintaining this facade, he encounters Sheeba, a spirited young woman determined to escape her family's pressures. Their intertwined journeys explore themes of love, identity, and societal expectations, all delivered with a blend of humor and heartfelt moments.

movies.title: Pravinkoodu Shappu
movies.cast: Soubin Shahir, Basil Joseph, Chemban Vinod Jose, Chandini Sreedharan, Shabareesh Varma
movies.crew: Sreeraj Sreenivasan (Director), Vishnu Vijay (Music), Shyju Khalid (Cinematography)
movies.plot: Pravinkoodu Shappu is a Malayalam black comedy crime thriller that unfolds in a village toddy shop. The story begins with the mysterious death of Babu, the shop owner, leading to an investigation by Sub Inspector Santhosh. As the investigation progresses, it becomes clear that each of the eleven individuals present at the time of the incident has a potential motive, making the case increasingly complex. The film masterfully blends suspense with dark humor, keeping audiences engaged with its unpredictable twists and turns.
